about_the_game:
Game Overview ------

Deckland is a single-player game that combines deck building, Yutnori-like mechanics, and roguelite features.

You become a sorcerer and travel back to ancient Korea.

Through battles, you can farm items and talismans, combining various talismans to protect the world from destruction!

Game Features ------

Card Synthesis

The card synthesis system allows you to combine cards to execute combo chains. For example: Plum Blossom Sword Technique -> Short-distance Technique -> Shielding Technique -> (Summon) Fire Slash.

It supports your limitless creative play!

Events

Experience a world filled with stories and fairy tales passed down through the ages. Your decisions will change the items you obtain.

Roguelite

Unlike typical games, in Deckland, if the player reaches a near-death state, all cards will be reset, and you will acquire new cards to use. Discover a stronger version of yourself and don’t fear death!

Story

The player awakens to a voice. Release, who claims to be the strongest sorcerer, exhausts all his energy fighting a monster. However, he barely survives in the form of a talisman and asks the player to embark on an adventure together. What conclusion will unfold afterward?

The story features branching paths and animated cutscenes to enhance immersion.

Souls

Players can utilize the souls of monsters to engage in more dynamic battles. Continue daring confrontations with cards obtained from defeated monsters and elite monsters!

If you need any further assistance, feel free to ask!
